author: Xi Xu
description: Chrome extension that accelerates downloads by redirecting them through Xget
name: xget-for-chrome

scripts.build: echo 'No build process required - extension runs from source'
scripts.dev: echo 'Open chrome://extensions/ and load unpacked extension'
scripts.lint: echo 'No linting configured - consider adding ESLint for JavaScript files'
scripts.release: npm run validate && npm run package
scripts.test: echo 'Load extension in Chrome Developer Mode to test'
